mapper.select: select a.orderSeq , a.orderRegDate , a.orderModDate , b.orderProductSeq , b.orderAccount , c.productName , c.productPrice , c.productTypeCd , d.memberTypeCd , d.memberName , e.deliverName , e.delivaryNumber , e.delivaryNameCd , e.statusCd from exits e left join orders a on e.orderSeqF = a.orderSeq left join orderProduct b on b.productSeqF = a.orderSeq left join product c on c.productSeq = b.productSeqF left join member d on d.memberSeq = b.orderSeqF ;
